Get Cheap Shared Hosting in London for as Little as $1.50/mo from ProximCloud!

cheap hosting, cheap shared hosting, london, maidenhead, proxim.cloud, proximcloud, shared, shared hosting May 14, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

ProximCloud is bringing us another great shared hosting offer in London.

  • Get started with their shared hosting for only $1.50/mo, or $1.20/mo on quarterly billing
  • Or step up to larger packages with 50GB or more of space for as low as $1.95/mo

You’ll need the coupon codes shown after the jump.

Please Note: Offers Ends May 31, 2021!

Their WHOIS is public. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept PayPal.  We last had an offer for them on April 10, 2021.

Here’s a little about ProximCloud in their own words:

ProximCloud is a small website hosting business, which has been in operation for over three years (since 28th Feb 2018), which has striven based on the reliability and low-cost factors of our services. ProximCloud always puts the customer first, and has ensured to provide our customers with many support-methods to ensure they can reach us when they need it, and when it suits them.

If you decide to give ProximCloud a try, please tell others how it goes in the comments below.

Now read more to see the offers!

Web Hosting Offers are shown WITHOUT the promo code applied.
